definition: impelled by physical force especially against resistance, use physical force against
details:
adjective
- impelled by physical force especially against resistance
= synonyms: physical
verb
- use physical force against
= example: use physical force against
- be bossy towards
= synonyms: bully, browbeat, bullyrag, ballyrag, boss around, hector, push around
- handle roughly
= example: handle roughly
= synonyms: manhandle
